title: Effective Collaborative Learning Design and Implementation in Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Proficiency in Online Learning Tools and Experience with Group Activities
context.additional_context: Hybrid structure combining in-person/remote sessions, enabling team-based project execution and feedback mechanisms.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the structured activity design process for collaborative learning in blended learning environments.
Learners can communicate effectively with team members and present task outcomes using digital tools (online forums, collaboration platforms, etc.).
Learners can apply feedback techniques that enhance social presence and operate peer evaluation systems.
Learners can propose and implement strategies to resolve conflicts arising during collaborative learning.

resources: Video Conferencing Tools (Zoom, Google Meet, etc.)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
